pages.title: About
pages.text: Hi there ğŸ‘‹Who am IJunWei is a security researcher and open-source enthusiast from Taiwan. A paranoid Pythonista and CPython contributor who now focuses on Android reverse engineering and malware analysis. And as a member of the PyCon Taiwan Program Committee, previously presented at Black Hat, DEFCON, HITB, ROOTCON, GrayHat, PyCon Europe/TW/KR/MY/IN. Heâ€™s the co-founder of Quark-Engine and the Quark package maintainer on Kali Linux, leading Quark to participate in the GSoC under the Honeynet Project since 2021. Google summer of code 2021 Mentor My Previous Talks The projects I am currently working on: Resume (English Version)

posts.title: pipenv
posts.text: Install from github1pipenv install -e git+https://github.com/quark-engine/quark-engine.git#egg=quark-engine First â€œquark-enigneâ€: user Second â€œquark-engineâ€: repo @develop: The branch what you want to install #egg=quark-engine: The package name that will be recorded in pipenv
